Conflicts:
	lib/main.js

Support Debug Mode from CFX.  Fix #5

debug:  opens debug tab
prefs:
  +x : simple-prefs.x
  y  : preferencesservice.set('y')

Usage:

  cfx run --static-args '{"debug":true, "prefs": {"+username": "Debug
McCode","general.warnOnAboutConfig":false}}'

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/mozilla/hotdish

Conflicts:
	data/sidebar/sidebar.html

Switch from Angular to React.  Copy a bunch of the HTML into components.js.  Add script to watch for changes to that JSX file.  Switch model code to creating React components, and triggering rerenders on changes.
Move dumpState() polling into debug code
adding in the Private Messages list
Avoid some cleanup errors on closing

Created a Tab class that represents Hotdish tabs, and a TabSet that is currently the window that Hotdish is activated on
Moved tab event handling into these classes
Moved worker handling into these classes
Refactored Group to use fancysidebar (removing buffering/etc)
Change hub non-message events to all be prefixed with 'hub' (so they can't clash with actual message types)
Created abstract models of the data in sidebar/js/model.js
Attempted (incomplete) to base the sidebar on Angular and those models
Added decodeQuery to the sidebar utils file
Added a sidebar replacement that handles initialization and message buffering to the sidebar worker
Added copyMethods and en/decodeQuery (for query string) methods
Add some additional TogetherJS configuration, that requires the hotdish branch of TogetherJS.  Suppress clicking on the viewer.  Allow TogetherJS location to be configured.

Begin work on #16: add browser-mirror-style sharing.
This adds a new button that starts a browser mirror session with someone (doesn't push, only joins someone else's session)
Currently syncs pages to the viewer, but doesn't do anything else - no shared cursors, no blocking clicks/etc.
Extract utils.setHandlers as a pattern of event binding.  Make peer list group-local.  Add event for a new peer.  Signal a notification when a new peer arrives.
Fix #91, do a local notification for chats
Use the Gregg image only when using staticAvatar setting, not just the generic debug setting.
Fix #64, keep camera aspect ratio.  Fix #90, keep avatars small.  Also add continuous mode.
Don't re-open already open tabs; makes the debug setting more friendly with session restore
Fix #87. Sort peers based on time of last message (when a new peer is added) and keep self at top
Make stringified hub messages shorter with respect to avatar
Avoid one sort of odd error in page workers

more styling for email feedback

adruck, this isn't bootstrappy, feel free to override.
Styling to make 'email feedback' omnipresent in sidebar
update peer on hello-back, not just hello
Add sdktab argument to the tracker emits.  Also track close
#2 Avatar updates from picture.  Sidebar reflects updates

Fix #63, version check or die

- checks that version is 26+
- if not, dies, shows error page, uninstalls.
Fix #75, make tab activate do stuff
